name: Snake 3D (itch) (NKiyoshi)
description:
A snake game with 3d flying movement! Marvel with the free flying movement and survive while you can in the arena. Collect apples to score points, and try to beat your highscore!

Different colored apples might give you superpowers:
Purple/Ghost apple - makes you immune to rock collisions!
Blue/Wind apple - vaccuums apples in a cone in front of you!
Golden apple - adds a lot more points to your score! 

Controls: Move with WSAD (inversed flying movement)
Hold space to speedup forwards
